argument.name: lResult
argument.description: .t. or .f. depending on whether the command succeeded.

argument.name: pValues
argument.description: A dot variable that has in/out properties (explained below)

argument.name: pResult
argument.description: A dot variable that two properties, 'hasError' - .t./.f. and 'errorText' (if there is an error)

page.description: Used in a Web application to delete an entry in the Work Queue. pValues.id is the value of the entry to be deleted.
page.discussion: pValues is a dot variable. Used in a Web application to delete an entry in the Work Queue. pValues.id is the value of the entry to be deleted.

section.description: These are the properties of pValues:

section.title: pValues.ID
section.description: pValues.ID is the GUID primary key of the record and is the only input property that matters for this call.
